+++ 
@@ -1,10 +1,10 @@
 name: Run Gitleaks on the PRIME ReportStream code-base
 
 on:
-  schedule:
-    # at GitHub midnight on the default branch
-    - cron: "0 0 * * *"
+  push:
+    branches:
+      - feature/lucasdze-test
 
 jobs:
   gitleaks:
     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
@@ -14,9 +14,9 @@
           # Fetch the full history
           fetch-depth: 0
 
       - name: "Run Gitleaks on a selected part of our history"
-        run: .environment/gitleaks/run-gitleaks.sh '2021-08-01T00:00:00-0400'
+        run: .environment/gitleaks/run-gitleaks.sh --since '2021-08-01T00:00:00-0400'
 
       - name: "Output non-sensitive log"
         if: always()
         run: cat "gitleaks.log"

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
name: Run Gitleaks on the PRIME ReportStream code-base

on:
  schedule:
    # at GitHub midnight on the default branch
    - cron: "0 0 * * *"

jobs:
  gitleaks:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@2541b1294d2704b0964813337f33b291d3f8596b
        with:
          # Fetch the full history
          fetch-depth: 0

      - name: "Run Gitleaks on a selected part of our history"
        run: .environment/gitleaks/run-gitleaks.sh '2021-08-01T00:00:00-0400'

      - name: "Output non-sensitive log"
        if: always()
        run: cat "gitleaks.log"
